section.name: Docker
section.p:
There's a JGroups image on (dockerhub) which can be used to run a cluster of JGroups demos on localhost. To run an instance, execute
docker run -it --rm belaban/jgroups
This will run the latest version of JGroups (currently 4.x)

There is also an automated build available:
docker run -it --rm belaban/jgroups-docker
The image can also be extended or modified by cloning the GitHub repo at https://github.com/belaban/jgroups-docker. The README explains how to run the demos.
